trans-unit.source: Get the IQN of a Windows host
trans-unit.target: Get the IQN of a Windows host

trans-unit.source: Explains how to get the iSCSI Qualified Name (IQN) of a computer running Windows Server 2012.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to get the iSCSI Qualified Name (IQN) of a computer running Windows Server 2012.

trans-unit.source: To get the IQN of a Windows host
trans-unit.target: To get the IQN of a Windows host

trans-unit.source: Start the Microsoft iSCSI initiator on your Windows host.
trans-unit.target: Start the Microsoft iSCSI initiator on your Windows host.

trans-unit.source: In the **iSCSI Initiator Properties** window, on the **Configuration** tab, select and copy the string from the **Initiator Name** field.
trans-unit.target: In the **iSCSI Initiator Properties** window, on the **Configuration** tab, select and copy the string from the **Initiator Name** field.
